text: (Zhe shi) cong zhenzhu ji qi shizhe zai da zhao zhi ri chuan shizhong ren de tonggao: Zhenzhu ji qi shizhe duiyu yi wu pei zhu zhe shi wu gan de. Ruguo nimen huiguo, na duiyu nimen shi geng hao de, ruguo nimen beili, namo, xuzhi nimen buneng taobi zhenzhu de qianze. Ni yi tongku de xingfa xiang bu xindao zhe baoxi ba.
